If you are a student in Austria, having health insurance is mandatory. The √ñsterreichische Gesundheitskasse (√ñGK) provides affordable student health insurance that covers doctor visits, hospitals, medications, and more. This guide explains how to apply, costs, and what‚Äôs covered.

‚úÖ Why Do Students Need Health Insurance in Austria?

‚úîÔ∏è Legal Requirement ‚Äì You must have valid health insurance for visa renewal.
‚úîÔ∏è Covers Doctor Visits ‚Äì General check-ups, specialists, and hospital care.
‚úîÔ∏è Prescriptions & Medications ‚Äì Most medicines are heavily discounted.
‚úîÔ∏è Emergency Treatment ‚Äì Ambulance, emergency services, and hospital stays.

üí° Without insurance, medical costs can be VERY expensive (‚Ç¨50-‚Ç¨500 per visit).

üìå Who Can Apply for √ñGK Student Insurance?

‚úîÔ∏è Non-EU/EEA students studying in Austria.
‚úîÔ∏è EU/EEA students who do NOT have an EHIC card.
‚úîÔ∏è Students under 27 years old (for discounted rates).
‚úîÔ∏è Self-funded students or students without employer-provided insurance.

üí° If you work part-time in Austria (earning over ‚Ç¨500/month), your employer will automatically register you for √ñGK insurance.

üí∞ How Much Does √ñGK Student Insurance Cost?

Type of InsuranceMonthly CostWho is Eligible?
Student √ñGK Insurance‚Ç¨66.79/monthStudents under 27, studying full-time
Self-Employed/Private Insurance‚Ç¨150 ‚Äì ‚Ç¨300/monthIf you do not qualify for student √ñGK
Employer-Paid √ñGK Insurance‚Ç¨0 (Paid by Employer)If you work part-time/full-time

üí° √ñGK Student Insurance is the cheapest option for students!

üìå How to Apply for √ñGK Student Insurance?

1Ô∏è‚É£ Prepare Your Documents

‚úîÔ∏è Passport or Residence Permit (Aufenthaltstitel)
‚úîÔ∏è Meldezettel (Address Registration)
‚úîÔ∏è University Enrollment Certificate (Studienbest√§tigung)
‚úîÔ∏è Bank Account IBAN (for automatic payments)

2Ô∏è‚É£ Submit Your Application

You can apply for √ñGK in person or online.

üìç Visit the nearest √ñGK office:
üîó Find your nearest √ñGK office here: √ñGK Locations

üñ•Ô∏è Online Registration (for existing customers):
üîó √ñGK Online Service

üí° Walk-in applications are accepted. No prior appointment is needed!

3Ô∏è‚É£ Receive Your E-Card (Health Insurance Card)

‚úîÔ∏è After approval, √ñGK will mail your E-Card to your registered address.
‚úîÔ∏è This card is needed for doctor visits, pharmacies, and hospital treatments.

üí° If you need medical treatment before receiving your E-Card, ask for a temporary insurance confirmation from √ñGK!

üè• What Does √ñGK Student Insurance Cover?

‚úîÔ∏è Doctor visits (Hausarzt, specialists, gynecologists, etc.)
‚úîÔ∏è Hospital treatment (emergency & planned surgeries)
‚úîÔ∏è Dental check-ups & basic dental treatment
‚úîÔ∏è Prescriptions & pharmacy discounts
‚úîÔ∏è Psychological therapy & mental health support
‚úîÔ∏è Ambulance & emergency transport

üí° Some services (braces, advanced dental work, private hospitals) require extra payment.

üîç How to Use Your √ñGK Insurance?

‚úîÔ∏è Show your E-Card at the doctor‚Äôs office.
‚úîÔ∏è Check if the doctor accepts ‚ÄúAlle Kassen‚Äù (public insurance).
‚úîÔ∏è You don‚Äôt have to pay for general doctor visits.
‚úîÔ∏è Prescriptions will be discounted at the pharmacy.

üí° For private doctors, you must pay upfront and request reimbursement from √ñGK.

‚ö†Ô∏è Common Problems & How to Solve Them

IssueSolution
Didn‚Äôt receive your E-Card?Contact √ñGK office to check your application status.
Need medical help before E-Card arrives?Ask for a temporary insurance confirmation from √ñGK.
Moving to a new address?Update your Meldezettel & √ñGK records.
Forgot to pay monthly fees?Pay through direct debit (SEPA) or at the bank.

üîó Final Summary: How to Get √ñGK Student Insurance

‚úîÔ∏è Check if you‚Äôre eligible for student insurance (‚Ç¨66.79/month).
‚úîÔ∏è Gather your documents (passport, Meldezettel, university enrollment certificate).
‚úîÔ∏è Apply at an √ñGK office or online.
‚úîÔ∏è Receive your E-Card for free medical treatment.
‚úîÔ∏è Use your insurance for doctor visits, hospitals, and prescriptions.

üéâ Now You Know How to Get Austrian Health Insurance as a Student!
With √ñGK insurance, you are covered for all medical needs in Austria. üöÄ
